wines.name: Calafuria
wines.why it works: Because it takes us back to fond memmories of summer days well spent
wines.description: An italian scape in a bottle. A cornicopia of red fruits and zippy grapefruit with a wiff of florals.

wines.name: Roederer Estate
wines.why it works: It has the luxury taste without the price tag. Happy?
wines.description: Crisp and elegant. Pear, spice and hazelnut flavors

wines.name: Yamhill Vineyards, Rosé
wines.Why it works: Did someone say picnic? The almost red wine texture of this wine makes it uniquely food friendly
wines.description: Bright and tropical, with flavors of mango, passionfruit and raspberry. This wine screams summer

wines.name: Veuve Clicquot Rosé
wines.Why it works: Champagne has been the epitome of celebration for centuries, synonymous of luxury and self-indulgence. Sure to put you on a great mood.
wines.description: Espressive aromas of strawberry and very ripe wild strawberries

wines.name: Brunello di Montalcino
wines.Why it works: Red wine scent replicates human pheromones, chemicals that cause intimate responses in humans
wines.description: Bold, elegant, sexy! Hints of vanilla and cherry.

wines.name: Petra Alto
wines.Why it works: When presented, this wine is usually compared to a Ferrrari. What else can we say?!
wines.description: Plum and blackbery. Sunshine and deliciousness.

wines.name: La Justice
wines.Why it works: Red wine scent replicates human pheromones, chemicals that cause intimate responses in humans
wines.description: Aromas of morello cherries, well balanced and a silky texture.

wines.name: Ramey
wines.Why it works: Because after a big day what's better than kick back and relax with your favorite wine
wines.description: A balance of elegance and richness. Bold red fruits and a hint of tobacco.

wines.name: Vina Robles
wines.Why it works: Because it makes you feel as if you are getting a warm hug after a long day.

wines.name: Santa Margherita
wines.Why it works: A light and refreshing glass of Pinot Grigio will comfort your feelings

wines.name: Veuve Clicquot
wines.Why it works: 'Come quickly, I am tasting the stars!'-Dom Perignon

wines.name: Far Niente
wines.Why it works: creamy Chardonnay can cure that feeling. Not only is it a mood-uplifter, but it’s delicious to the core.
wines.description: A mouthwatering finish of aromas of melon, hazelnut, orange, and spice.
